## Assignment Information

Welcome to the first R assignment. This file is a starter for you to create your slope charts in R.
I include starter code for you to use to download the data. 

```{r Package set up and data location}
library(tidyverse)
urlfile="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/flynnecon/datavizf25/refs/heads/main/data/birth_rates_370f25.csv"
slopedata <- read_csv(url(urlfile))
```
